64585.<voice 00663_00064585><start_lip_sync n0:

go to war to defend it.

64586.<voice 00820_00064586><start_lip_sync n0:

of soldiers at the time, came up with a plan.

64594.<voice 01205_00064594><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01205_00064594><start_lip_sync n02236 _normal m00001>Yeah, I guess so.<stop_lip_animation n02236 CLOSE_MOUTH>

Bermud
